naslov: Sofisticirana vila - novogradnja s 2 kategorizirana stana (prodaja)
opis: Ova ekskluzivna samostojeća katnica u Pirovcu, smještena je u mirnom okruženju, svega 500 metara od mora i u neposrednoj blizini centra mjesta. Elegantna novogradnja iz 2023. godine savršeno spaja suvremen dizajn, izvanserijski komfor i luksuz te predstavlja idealnu priliku za život, odmor ili investiciju. Ukupne stambene površine od 200 m², ova vila sastoji se od dva potpuno odvojena, luksuzno uređena stana – po jedan na svakoj etaži – povezani unutarnjim stepeništem. Nekretnina se nalazi na zemljištu od 355 m² i raspolaže s čak tri privatna parkirna mjesta. Svaki stan nudi dvije komforne spavaće sobe, modernu kupaonicu s walk-in tušem i vrhunskom opremom te otvoreni prostor kuhinje, blagovaonice i dnevnog boravka, s izlazom na veliku natkrivenu terasu – savršenu za opuštanje ili druženje. Dizajn interijera odiše stilom boutique hotela – sofisticiran, ali udoban, s toplim tonovima, drvenim podovima i suvremenom rasvjetom. Svaki stan kvadrature je 89 četvornih metara. Poseban ugođaj pružaju dvije terase – jedna s elegantnom blagovaonicom na otvorenom, a druga s luksuznom jacuzzi kadom i predivnim pogledom na zelenilo i mirno prirodno okruženje stvarajući oazu  za uživanje u zalascima sunca ili večernjem opuštanju. Kuća je potpuno opremljena i odmah useljiva, uključujući sve moderne aparate i vrhunski namještaj koji je uključen u cijenu. Posjeduje dva odvojena brojila za struju i vodu. Energetski certifikat A+ donosi maksimalnu energetsku učinkovitost. Uporabna dozvola ishodovana. Lokacija: Pirovac je slikovito mediteransko mjesto na Šibenskoj rivijeri koje nudi sve – od bogate povijesti i kulturnih znamenitosti do kristalno čistog mora, borovih šuma i idiličnih uvala i lijepih šetnica. Izvrsna prometna povezanost, blizina nacionalnih parkova i atraktivnih turističkih destinacija čini ovu lokaciju idealnom za život i odmor. PREPORUKA AGENTA Za sve detaljne informacije i dogovoer termina Vašeg razgleda stojim Vam na raspolaganju na 095-3995519. Nives Ivković dipl. oec. Dogma nekretnine d.o.o. real estate agent +38595-3995519 This exclusive detached house in Pirovac is located in a quiet environment, just 500 meters from the sea and in the immediate vicinity of the town center. The elegant new building from 2023 perfectly combines contemporary design, exceptional comfort and luxury and represents an ideal opportunity for living, vacation or investment. With a total living area of ​​198 m², this villa consists of two completely separate, luxuriously furnished apartments – one on each floor – connected by an internal staircase. The property is located on a plot of 355 m² and has three private parking spaces. Each apartment offers two comfortable bedrooms, a modern bathroom with a walk-in shower and top-quality equipment, and an open space of the kitchen, dining room and living room, with access to a large covered terrace – perfect for relaxing or socializing. The interior design exudes the style of a boutique hotel – sophisticated, yet comfortable, with warm tones, wooden floors and modern lighting. Two terraces provide a special atmosphere - one with an elegant outdoor dining area, and the other with a luxurious jacuzzi tub and a beautiful view of the greenery and peaceful natural surroundings, creating an oasis for enjoying sunsets or evening relaxation. The house is fully equipped and ready to move in immediately, including all modern appliances and top-quality furniture that is included in the price. It has two separate electricity and water meters. The A+ energy certificate brings maximum energy efficiency. The occupancy permit has been obtained. Location: Pirovac is a picturesque Mediterranean town on the Šibenik Riviera that offers everything - from rich history and cultural sights to crystal clear sea, pine forests and idyllic bays and beautiful promenades. Excellent transport connections, proximity to national parks and attractive tourist destinations make this location ideal for living and vacation.
